name: MorrisseySimonBattle
_source: s;Morrissey;Impressive, Verstadt. I expected resistance, but you've put up quite the fight.
s;Simon;You can still surrender.{w} I would spare you, I swear.
s;Morrissey;Even in that, you show your naivety.|You are not ready to rule, Simon.|Now concede to your better!
